name: Sufferjump 4:Colorful pain
description:
The 4th entry in the sufferjump series.

Featuring mechanics such as:

Money

Sanity

Breathing

from your money you may buy medication to help your sanity or checkpoints.

If you are poor you will probably have to choose between these two,unlike the owners of sufferjump 4 premium luxury deluxe edition available for 14.99$!(15.00)

I forgot the bindings of the reset and breathe button,so you'll have to find those yourself.

The game is beatable,although not that easy.
